content: daisy baby bib free crochet pattern -materials cotton yarn i used lily sugar and cream cotton in yellow white and country green g hook 4mm needle for weaving in ends scissors -gauge my hook size and gauge make the bib about 6 inches wide and 5 inches tall not including the ties i do have a tight gauge so you may want to adjust your hook size -abbreviations chain - chain single_crochet - single_crochet single_crochet decrease - single_crochet decrease slip_stitch - slip_stitch rs - right side ws - wrong side st s - stitch es page | 1 daisy baby bib free pattern -pattern chain 15 1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and in the next 13 chain 14 sts 2 chain 1 turn 2sc single_crochet in next 12 2sc 3 chain 1 turn 2sc single_crochet in next 14 2sc 4 chain 1 turn 2sc single_crochet in next 16 2sc 5 chain 1 turn 2sc single_crochet in next 18 2sc 6 chain 1 turn 2sc single_crochet in next 20 2sc 7-14 chain 1 turn single_crochet across 15 chain 1 turn single_crochet decrease single_crochet in next 20 single_crochet decrease 16 chain 1 turn single_crochet decrease single_crochet in next 18 single_crochet decrease 17 chain 1 turn single_crochet decrease single_crochet in next 16 single_crochet decrease 18 chain 1 turn single_crochet decrease single_crochet in next 14 single_crochet decrease now working on the shoulders 1 chain 1 turn single_crochet decrease single_crochet single_crochet decrease leave remaining stitches chain 1 turn 2 chain 1 turn single_crochet decrease single_crochet 3 chain 1 turn single_crochet decrease other shoulder slip_stitch in 5th st from the end 1 chain 1 single_crochet decrease single_crochet single_crochet decrease 2 chain 1 turn single_crochet single_crochet decrease 3 chain 1 turn single_crochet decrease border with the rs facing start at the neck of the bib single_crochet along the edge and up the edge of the shoulder when you get to the top of the shoulder chain 45 slip_stitch back down making one of the ties single_crochet 3 more sts along the outside of the bib now start your shell pattern around the sides and bottom of the bib *shell pattern* single_crochet double_crochet single_crochet in stitch slip_stitch in next 2 sts continue shell pattern until you reach the beginning of the shoulder on the other side of the bib single_crochet along the edge of the shoulder when you get to the top of the shoulder chain 45 slip_stitch back down making the second tie continue to single_crochet along the edge until you get back to where you started join to first single_crochet cut off yarn and weave in remaining ends daisy and leaf patterns -flower magic_ring single_crochet 6 sts in the circle pull tight and join chain 1 3dc in same st as join chain 1 slip_stitch in same st 1 petal made *slip_stitch into next st chain 1 3dc in same st chain 1 slip_stitch in same st * repeat * * until you have 6 petals cut yarn leaving a long tail page |
